languages.text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it by pressing [{bind|OpenInventory}] or clicking on the bag icon on the right side of the screen.
On the inventory screen, weapons, armour, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in other ways. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal injuries.
languages.original_text:
Вы получили новые предметы! Все предметы находятся в инвентаре — чтобы открыть инвентарь, нажмите [{bind|OpenInventory}] или кликните на иконку сумки в правой части экрана.
Оружие, броню и другие предметы можно экипировать на персонажей или иначе взаимодействовать с ними. С помощью {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплекта{/g} можно пополнять {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} и исцелять {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранения{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it by pressing [{bind|OpenInventory}] or clicking on the bag icon on the right side of the screen.
Weapons, armour, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in some other way. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}njuries{/g}.

You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it by pressing [{bind|OpenInventory}] or clicking on the bag icon on the right side of the screen.
On the inventory screen, weapons, armour, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in other ways. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal injuries.

On the inventory screen, weapons, armour, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in other ways. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}njuries{/g}.

You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it by pressing [{bind|OpenInventory}] or clicking on the bag icon on the right side of the screen.
On the inventory screen, weapons, armour, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in other ways. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal injuries.

languages.text:
Вы получили новые предметы! Все предметы находятся в инвентаре — чтобы открыть инвентарь, нажмите [{bind|OpenInventory}] или кликните на иконку сумки в правой части экрана.
Оружие, броню и другие предметы можно экипировать на персонажей или иначе взаимодействовать с ними. С помощью {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплекта{/g} можно пополнять {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} и исцелять {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранения{/g}.
languages.original_text:
You have received new items! To open the Inventory, press [{bind|OpenInventory}] or click on the bag icon on the right side of the screen.
Weapons, armour and other items can be equipped. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikit{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wounds{/g} and heal {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Injuries{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Вы получили новые предметы! Чтобы открыть инвентарь, нажмите [{bind|OpenInventory}] или кликните на иконку сумки в правой части экрана.
Оружие, броню и другие предметы можно выбрать для использования персонажами. А {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплект{/g} позволяет восстанавливать {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} и лечить {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранения{/g}.

Вы получили новые предметы! Чтобы открыть инвентарь, нажмите [{bind|OpenInventory}] или кликните на иконку сумки в правой части экрана.
Оружие, броню и другие предметы можно выбрать для использования персонажами. А {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплект{/g} позволяет восстанавливать {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} и лечить {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранения{/g}.

languages.text:
您获得了新物品！所有物品都会添加到您的物品栏中。您可以按下[{bind|OpenInventory}]，或点击屏幕右侧的袋子图标打开物品栏。
您可以打开物品栏，装备武器与护甲，或通过其他方式与其他物品进行互动。{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}可以用来恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，治疗伤势。
languages.original_text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it by pressing [{bind|OpenInventory}] or clicking on the bag icon on the right side of the screen.
On the inventory screen, weapons, armour, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in other ways. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal injuries.

traits.locale_text:
您获得了新物品！所有物品都会添加到您的物品栏中。您可以按下[{bind|OpenInventory}]，或点击屏幕右侧的袋子图标打开物品栏。
您可以打开物品栏，装备武器与{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}，或通过其他方式与其他物品进行互动。{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}可以用来恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，治疗伤势。

languages.text:
新しいアイテムを手に入れた！アイテムはすべてインベントリに追加される。[{bind|OpenInventory}]を押すか画面右側の袋アイコンをクリックすると、インベントリを開くことができる。
インベントリ画面では、武器、防具、その他のアイテムを様々な方法で装備したり操作したりできる。{g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}の回復と負傷の治療に使用できる。
languages.original_text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it by pressing [{bind|OpenInventory}] or clicking on the bag icon on the right side of the screen.
On the inventory screen, weapons, armour, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in other ways. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal injuries.

traits.locale_text:
新しいアイテムを手に入れた！アイテムはすべてインベントリに追加される。[{bind|OpenInventory}]を押すか画面右側の袋のアイコンをクリックすると、インベントリを開くことができる。
インベントリ画面で、武器、{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}、その他のアイテムは、他の方法で装備したり操作したりできる。{g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g} の回復と怪我の治療に使用できる。

languages.text:
¡Has conseguido objetos nuevos! Todos los objetos se añaden a tu inventario. Puedes abrirlos pulsando [{bind|OpenInventory}] o haciendo clic en el icono de la bolsa situado en la parte derecha de la pantalla.
Dentro del inventario, el procedimiento para equipar o interactuar con armas, armaduras y otros objetos es distinto. Los {g|ib:Medikit}botiquines{/g} pueden usarse para sanar {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} y tratar lesiones.
languages.original_text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it by pressing [{bind|OpenInventory}] or clicking on the bag icon on the right side of the screen.
On the inventory screen, weapons, armour, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in other ways. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal injuries.

traits.locale_text:
¡Has conseguido objetos nuevos! Todos los objetos se añaden a tu inventario. Puedes abrirlos pulsando [{bind|OpenInventory}] o haciendo clic en el icono de la bolsa situado en la parte derecha de la pantalla.
Dentro del inventario, el procedimiento para equipar o interactuar con armas, {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armaduras{/g} y otros objetos es distinto. Los {g|ib:Medikit}botiquines{/g} pueden usarse para sanar {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} y tratar lesiones.

languages.text:
Du hast neue Gegenstände erhalten! Alle Gegenstände werden deinem Inventar hinzugefügt. Du kannst es öffnen, indem du [{bind|OpenInventory}] drückst oder auf das Taschensymbol auf der rechten Bildschirmseite klickst.
Im Inventarbildschirm kannst du Waffen, Rüstungen und andere Gegenstände ausrüsten oder auf andere Weise mit ihnen interagieren. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} können verwendet werden, um {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} aufzufüllen und Verletzungen zu heilen.
languages.original_text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it by pressing [{bind|OpenInventory}] or clicking on the bag icon on the right side of the screen.
On the inventory screen, weapons, armour, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in other ways. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal injuries.

traits.locale_text:
Du hast neue Gegenstände erhalten! Alle Gegenstände werden deinem Inventar hinzugefügt. Du kannst es öffnen, indem du [{bind|OpenInventory}] drückst oder auf das Taschensymbol auf der rechten Bildschirmseite klickst.
Im Inventarbildschirm kannst du Waffen, {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstungen{/g} und andere Gegenstände ausrüsten oder auf andere Weise mit ihnen interagieren. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} können verwendet werden, um {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} aufzufüllen und Verletzungen zu heilen.

languages.text:
Vous avez obtenu de nouveaux objets ! Tous les objets sont ajoutés à votre inventaire. Pour l'ouvrir, appuyez sur [{bind|OpenInventory}] ou cliquez sur l'icône en forme de sac sur la droite de l'écran.
Dans l'inventaire, les armes, les armures et les autres objets peuvent être équipés ou utilisés d'une autre manière. Les {g|ib:Medikit}médikits{/g} permettent de reconstituer la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} et de soigner les lésions.
languages.original_text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it by pressing [{bind|OpenInventory}] or clicking on the bag icon on the right side of the screen.
On the inventory screen, weapons, armour, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in other ways. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal injuries.

traits.locale_text:
Vous avez obtenu de nouveaux objets ! Tous les objets sont ajoutés à votre inventaire. Pour l'ouvrir, appuyez sur [{bind|OpenInventory}] ou cliquez sur l'icône en forme de sac située à droite de l'écran.
Sur l'écran d'inventaire, les armes, les {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armures{/g} et les autres objets peuvent être équipés ou utilisés d'une autre manière. Les {g|ib:Medikit}médikits{/g} permettent de reconstituer la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} et de soigner les lésions.

languages.text:
Yeni eşyalar elde ettin! Edindiğin tüm eşyalar envanterine eklenir. Envanteri [{bind|OpenInventory}] tuşuna basarak veya ekranın sağ tarafındaki çanta simgesine tıklayarak açabilirsin.
Envanter ekranında silah, zırh ve diğer eşyaları kuşanabilir veya onlarla başka şekillerde etkileşime girebilirsin. {g|ib:Medikit}Sıhhiye çantaları{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} tazelemekte ve sakatlıkları tedavi etmekte kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it by pressing [{bind|OpenInventory}] or clicking on the bag icon on the right side of the screen.
On the inventory screen, weapons, armour, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in other ways. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal injuries.
